search_05_001/4301_1101_0100_20:
[Name:PlayerNickname ] had made [EN:Gen Ref="255" M="his" F="her" ] way to
the forest to do some intensive training
with [EN:Gen Ref="255" M="his" F="her" ] Pokémon...
search_05_001/4301_1101_0200_20:
when suddenly, [EN:Gen Ref="255" M="he" F="she" ] heard the sharp cry of a
different Pokémon nearby!
search_05_001/4301_1001_0800_10:
You...you all found him for me, didn’t you?
How can I thank you?
search_05_001/4301_1001_0900_10: That Torchic... He’s my partner Pokémon!
search_05_001/4301_1001_1000_10:
I’m still an evolving Trainer—just a beginner,
really. I’ve heard people call me a
Rising Star, but...
search_05_001/4301_1001_1100_10:
I’m not very confident in my battling skills yet...
My Torchic doesn’t really listen to me.
search_05_001/4301_1001_1200_10:
I only looked away for a moment earlier,
and he ran away from me...
search_05_001/4301_1001_1300_10:
Wait... Where’s Torchic now?! Don’t tell me he
already ran off again!
search_05_001/4301_1001_1400_10:
No way! I can’t believe this...
Wh-where in the world did he go this time?!
search_05_001/4301_0401_1600_10:
Y-you’re right... Panicking isn’t going to get me
anywhere. I need to go find him!
search_05_001/4301_0302_1700_10: He can’t have gone too far!
search_05_001/4301_0402_1800_10:
Y-you’re right... If I run now, I should still be
able to catch up with him!
search_05_001/4301_0401_2000_10:
Th-thank you so much!
That would be amazing!
search_05_001/4301_0402_2200_10:
Th-thank you so much!
That would be amazing!
